title: WTB Larry Doyle With Bat miscuts, ghosts, blank back and other "freaks"

posts.post_title: WTB Larry Doyle With Bat miscuts, ghosts, blank back and other "freaks"
posts.post_content:
I recently acquired the Yellow Brown printers scrap of this card and I would love to add a few more "strange" copies to my collection.

So if  you have and unique examples I'd love to see them
